name: Toshiro the Mighty
description:
Traverse a dungeon as Toshiro, to look for the key to a massive door. Kill enemies and take their abilities to complete puzzles.

-- Controls --

  • A/D to move
  • W/Space to Jump
  • Click for attacking and picking up items

Programming by Mad Monkey Games -- https://mad-monkey-games.itch.io/

Art by DarkCyberman22#4423

Music by dsminor -- https://soundcloud.com/user-103833878

Made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 150
